harlan_tape01.text: This is NCR Ranger Harlan Voss. If you're hearing this... I'm still looking for my boy. Jax, if you're out there... I won't stop.

harlan_tape02.text: Jax was here. I found his pack. Blood on the rocks. I'm close now... closer than ever.

harlan_tape03.text: I saw them. Vault-Tec. They moved Jax's body into the canyon. I'm going after them. If I don't make it... tell him I tried.

harlan_note01.text: Jax â€” I found your trail again. I won't give up. Not now. Not ever.

harlan_finalnote.text: If anyone finds this... follow the trail. My son is still out there. I won't stop. Not until I bring him home.

harlan_memory_echo.text: Jax... I swear I'll find you. Even if it kills me.

harlan_ghoul_variant.text: I ain't what I used to be... but I still remember my boy.
